title: Server Disconnect?
body:
Last night around 2-3 AM EST, I was disconnected from League while in a ranked match. I couldn't log in and I couldnt access the forums, yet my internet was still working. I figured the server just crashed and I went to bed only to wake up this morning to see I have a Loss and a Leave. 

Did anyone else disconnect or have issues like this before? C

replies.body:
That's really strange! Did you see any specific error messages when you tried to log in on the client or website? 

I can't remove any Leaver penalties or reverse your match history, but please let me know if you have any questions.
